note.p: Death: Harley Street, Cavendish Square, London (24 August 1804)

Career: Practitioner Engineer, Corps of Engineers (1758); took part in the capture of Guadeloupe (1759); Lieutenant (1760); Captain Lieutenant (1763); sent to Madras (1770); Chief Engineer in campaigns against Tanjore (1771-1775); in Enland (1793-1795); retuned to India; Colonel (1796); Major General (1797); MP for Horsham (1802-1804)
